name: Wisper (Void Arcade)
description:
Game Features:

16 levels including dangerous caves, clockwork cities, and abyssal depths

Utilize various powers to skillfully navigate through dangerous environments

3 challenging boss encounters to test your acquired skills

Controls:

Movement - WASD

Blink - Space

Invulnerability - E

Slow Time - Q

Game Menu - ESC

========================================================== 

Download original soundtrack here: https://voidarcade.bandcamp.com/ 

Discord: https://discord.com/invite/HGkbGWQWqH 

========================================================== 

A word form the developer 

Thank you for your interest in my game! Wisper is the first game I've created and it was a difficult (but rewarding) process. I had no prior experience with C#, Unity, or Blender, so the entire project took around 6 months to complete. Please feel free to leave constructive feedback in the comments below or (better yet) join my Discord and be part of the community (link above)! 

A huge thank-you to my friends and family who play-tested the game and provided feedback!

Release date: 9/30/2021 By Void Arcade
